medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started yesterday, near the lower midline portion of the abdomen, associated with anorexia, bloating, subjective fevers, and diaphoresis. No nausea or vomiting or changes in bowel movements. He has never had similar pain before. He reported eating seafood a couple of days ago, but his wife did not develop similar symptoms. Additionally, there are positive symptoms for headaches, upper respiratory infection symptoms, and fatigue starting late last week.
